segments.text: Hey , Andrew . How's everything with work ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , I guess . My boss has been on my back recently .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You know , just giving me lots to do . I'm really busy right now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you ? What are you busy with ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , lots of things . Mostly training new people .
segments.speaker: S1
